thread.title: Sports Play-by-Play Board Operator - Part-Time - Sports Media
thread.title_full: Sports Play-by-Play Board Operator - Part-Time - Sports Media

title: Sports Play-by-Play Board Operator - Part-Time - Sports Media
text: Posted/Updated: 10-16-2015 Brief Job Description: Responsible for all aspects of sports play-by-play game broadcasts including quality control, auditioning audio elements prior to broadcast, playing commercials and promos during breaks, following game format, logging   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
